entity.name: phenotype_call
entity.query: SELECT s.id as doc_id, o.name as phenotyping_center, s.external_id as project_external_id, s.parameter_id as parameter_id, s.procedure_id as procedure_id, s.pipeline_id as pipeline_id, s.gf_acc as marker_accession_id, gf.symbol as marker_symbol, s.allele_acc as allele_accession_id, al.name as allele_name, al.symbol as allele_symbol, s.strain_acc as strain_accession_id, st.name as strain_name, s.sex as sex, s.zygosity as zygosity, p.name as project_name, p.fullname as project_fullname, s.mp_acc as mp_term_id, ot.name as mp_term_name, s.p_value as p_value, s.effect_size as effect_size, s.colony_id, db.name as resource_fullname, db.short_name as resource_name FROM phenotype_call_summary s INNER JOIN organisation o ON s.organisation_id = o.id INNER JOIN project p ON s.project_id = p.id INNER JOIN ontology_term ot ON ot.acc = s.mp_acc INNER JOIN genomic_feature gf ON s.gf_acc = gf.acc LEFT OUTER JOIN strain st ON s.strain_acc = st.acc LEFT OUTER JOIN allele al ON s.allele_acc = al.acc INNER JOIN external_db db ON s.external_db_id = db.id WHERE (0.0001 >= s.p_value OR s.external_db_id = 20)

entity.name: mps
entity.query: SELECT distinct top_level_node_id FROM `mp_node2term` mp , mp_node_top_level tl WHERE term_id='${phenotype_call.mp_term_id}' and mp.node_id=tl.node_id

entity.name: mphigher
entity.query: SELECT mp.node_id, mp.term_id as mpTerm, inf.term_id, name, definition FROM `mp_node2term` mp , `mp_term_infos` inf WHERE mp.node_id=${mps.top_level_node_id} and inf.term_id=mp.term_id

entity.name: parents
entity.query: select f.node_id as parent_node_id from mp_node2term nt, mp_node_subsumption_fullpath f where nt.node_id=f.child_node_id and nt.term_id='${phenotype_call.mp_term_id}'

entity.name: phenotype_parameter
entity.query: select stable_id, name from phenotype_parameter where id=${phenotype_call.parameter_id}

entity.name: phenotype_procedure
entity.query: select id, stable_id, name, stable_key from phenotype_procedure where id=${phenotype_call.procedure_id}

entity.name: phenotype_pipeline
entity.query: select stable_id, name, stable_key from phenotype_pipeline where id=${phenotype_call.pipeline_id}
